text:
Can we have repeatable groups in style tab on modules?
We could use that to generate advanced CSS styles for properties that allows it, like box-shadow and so on.

Also, there cases where text fields may have a use case in the style tab. Which you can add it through the DM when it's inside a group (you get the full list to pick actually). But then you get an internal error :slightly_smiling_face:.

Finally, RGBA colors should be allowed on style tabs :upside_down_face:

Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.
*Can have version control in HubDB*? Good use case for us is not just so we have access to a record, but also for compliance purpose.
